Package com.IGallinari.LastGame.repository

Interface FavTeamRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<FavTeam,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<FavTeam,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<FavTeam,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<FavTeam,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<FavTeam,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<FavTeam>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<FavTeam,Integer>
@Repository public interface FavTeamRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<FavTeam,Integer>
This interface represents the repository for managing FavTeam entities. It extends the JpaRepository interface provided by Spring Data JPA.

  • Method Details

    • findByUserAndTeam

      FavTeam findByUserAndTeam(User user, Team team)
      Retrieves a FavTeam object by User and Team.
      Parameters:
      user - The user associated with the FavTeam.
      team - The team associated with the FavTeam.
      Returns:
      The FavTeam object with the specified user and team or null if not found.

    • findFavTeamsByUser

      @Query(value="SELECT ft.idTeam FROM favteam ft WHERE ft.idUser=:inputIdUser", nativeQuery=true) List<Integer> findFavTeamsByUser(@Param("inputIdUser") int idUser)
      Retrieves a list of team IDs marked as favorite by a user.
      Parameters:
      idUser - The ID of the user for whom to retrieve favorite team IDs.
      Returns:
      List of team IDs marked as favorite by the user.

    • existsByIdUserAndIdTeam

      @Query(value="SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM favteam WHERE idUser = :inputIdUser AND idTeam = :inputIdTeam)", nativeQuery=true) int existsByIdUserAndIdTeam(@Param("inputIdUser") int idUser, @Param("inputIdTeam") int idTeam)
      Checks if a record with the specified user ID and team ID exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      idUser - The ID of the user.
      idTeam - The ID of the team.
      Returns:
      1 if the record exists, 0 otherwise.
